Text:
Donald Trump supporters can now purchase 2016 swag — including an array of “Make America Great Again” caps — in the Republican presidential candidate’s just-launched official campaign store.

The Trump camp opened the online shop on Thursday, just hours before the first GOP debate.

ADVERTISEMENT

Among the “100% made in the USA” items: Trump koozies ($20 for a pack of six), a $12.50 pair of red-and-white pompoms, an $18 infant onesie, along with a typical assortment of shirts and sweatshirts, including a $50 “presidential unisex hoodie.”

A “headwear” section also sells a variety of hats that the 69-year-old White House hopeful has made a habit of donning at public appearances. An “official Donald Trump Make America Great Again Cap” — available in a wide range of color options — retails for $25.

The trucker hats had previously only been sold at a store inside Trump Tower in Manhattan and had reportedly sold out within hours.
